body:
FYI, I just checked whether https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/23136/ is any help here, and it is:
Before (tip as of this morning, includes the sparse CL):
```
time go test
...
real	0m7.208s
user	0m9.288s
sys	0m0.277s
```
After:
```
time go test
...
real	0m4.488s
user	0m4.613s
sys	0m0.266s
```
That is queued up for 1.8.
